page.title: 14Farming
page.content: Mr.R.Knight is semi-retired but still helps out with some work on the farm. It covers 275 acres and has pigs,cattle and sheep.There is a specialist pig unit which has 800 pigs.They are sold to butchers for bacon,pork etc.Breeding sows are also sold to other pig units.The markets used for buying and selling other livestock are Northampton and Kettering.They also grow other arable crops and make their own silage for feeding cattle in the winter. There are 3 men working on the farm together with Mr.R. and Mr.B.Knight. They have tractors,ploughs,drills, silage chopper,sprayers,sludge tankers, bailers and a combine which harvests the grain. Mr.R.Knight remembers his father had no tractors and only 7 men to do the work.
